General.Name: Hubei Guangji Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Guangji Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pharmaceutical raw materials, medicinal feed additives, fine chemicals, and preparations in China. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions worldwide. Hubei Guangji Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is based in Wuxue, China.
